Package com.patreonshout.jpa

Class Posts

java.lang.Object
com.patreonshout.jpa.Posts
@Component
public class Posts
extends java.lang.Object
Posts Repository Wrapper

Responsibilities: 1) Be a wrapper class for PostsRepository 2) Add any logic needed before going into PostsRepository

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) PostsRepository postsRepository
    postsRepository is the PatreonInfoRepository class that handles all logic regarding database connections with the patreon_info table

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Posts()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<PostBean> getAllPosts()
    getAllPosts() returns every post in the database
    PostBean getPost​(java.lang.String url)
    getPost() gets a specific post based on the post url
    void putPost​(PostBean pb)
    putPost() adds a new Post to the database
    void removePost​(java.lang.String url)
    removePost() removes a post in the database based on the post url
    void updatePost​(PostBean pb)
    updatePost() updates an existing post in the database based on the post_id

  • Method Details

    • getPost

      public PostBean getPost​(java.lang.String url)
      getPost() gets a specific post based on the post url
      Parameters:
      url - is the url of the Patreon post
      Returns:
      a PostBean object containing the Patreon post information of the given url

    • getAllPosts

      public java.util.List<PostBean> getAllPosts()
      getAllPosts() returns every post in the database
      Returns:
      a List of PostBean containing every post in the database

    • putPost

      public void putPost​(PostBean pb)
      putPost() adds a new Post to the database
      Parameters:
      pb - is the post to be added to the database

    • updatePost

      public void updatePost​(PostBean pb)
      updatePost() updates an existing post in the database based on the post_id
      Parameters:
      pb - is the post to be updated in the database

    • removePost

      public void removePost​(java.lang.String url)
      removePost() removes a post in the database based on the post url
      Parameters:
      url - is the url of the Patreon post
